title: 【#生スバル】劇場版 機動戦士ガンダムⅡ 哀・戦士編 同時視聴しゅばああああああああ！！！！：MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM Ⅱ: Soldiers of Sorrow【ホロライブ/大空スバル】
name: Oozora Subaru

entries.text: I think I'd like to watch that.
We plan to start watching at about 10 minutes past the hour.
I'd like to start watching, but...
Subaru will be watching on Amazon Prime again today, so thanks.
For those watching on DVD or something...
It might be out of sync.
It might get out of sync...
My voice is raspy because I just woke up.
Don't worry about it, it's just the usual "just woke up" voice.
It starts with the thing called Sunrise.
It starts from the Sunrise logo, so please get ready.
Gets super heavy and freezes or something...
Basically, I don't plan to stop.
If that happens to everyone, just press F5 for now.
If you press F5, it reloads and usually gets better.
When this remains as an archive...
It'll be connected properly, so I thought that's better.
Ah, gotta bring up the clock.
Everyone please press the start button.
You should push start button at pochi. Yoroshiku Onegai shimasu.
Today, too... the last one was pretty amazing, so...
You know, after watching that again and again, I thought...
Amuro is a little bit pitiful!
Wait, let me bring up my notes.
Learning that Bright isn't super old...
I thought it was like some paste-like...
What to do... if you need to go to the bathroom...
There is a real possibility of a "Bathroom Pause".
But going to the bathroom during a good part...
Even though I'd keep going if YouTube froze...
Apparently, it makes it harder to need the toilet.
Munching loudly while commentating is kinda...
Alright, I'd like to start watching. Are you guys ready?
Alright, let's watch Mobile Suit Gundam The Movie II: Soldiers of Sorrow.
The BGM sounds like an alien movie.
A recap. Ah, sorry, it was a colony.
This is super easy to understand.
Oh... just because he could read the manual...
Is this his form with increased proficiency?
Just a while ago he was playing with circuits at home in his underwear.
They're trying to use it well.
Well, I don't know if he's a good person or what, but...
He has ambition and sees what's around him.
This is bad! This bearded guy is super high ranking!
Don't appeal your competence too much!
Is this okay? Amuro, doing that?!
He's peeking in! He's totally an idol!
Don't get too happy! Amuro! This is bad!
He's completely caught in the trap!
He's making him move, that's crazy!
Is he flashing a peace sign?
But seeing this, Amuro is legitimately amazing.
The cameras were in the eyes.
Ah, the main camera is in the forehead.
He's gonna get scolded for this, surely.
I thought a Bright Slap was coming.
It really is her big brother.
He was originally on this side.
He seems like a good guy.
Wait, Bright is gonna do it!?
So he's not a Zeon person.
He can map it now too?
Is this the time to launch?!
Yabai, so much info being leaked.
That old man is a nice person.
Scary, her situational judgment is perfect.
Eh, we aren't in battle right now, right?
He worked until he was mentally unstable...
Bright was also a total mess.
No matter how you think about it.
Ramba Ral is a good person.
What? Which? Is he found out?
If he says that, it's really bad.
His eye for people is too good.
The caterpillar treads getting hit is bad.
Eh, is he okay? What was that? Yabai.
Yaba, what to do about this person?
Well, he is a good person.
Amuro has strong mental fortitude, huh?
This bearded guy is crazy, right?
When they were shooting at each other...
This looks better, which is crazy.
Don't say that stuff so loudly!
Wait, you guys made them use it.
Is he okay? Yabe yabe yabe yabe.
Looks like a mage or something.
No no no, he's doing his best.
Eh, charging from the front is too amazing.
Ah, you mean she'll protect him?
This isn't the time for boosters!
They call the coordination "Jet Stream Attack".
The wife can do anything too!
Eh? Was that a mental image?
Isn't this beyond just a "sixth sense"?
She was just running away though.
And the feeling of "Well, she was using him"...
And "Amuro, you were deceived"... all these feelings are mixing, it's crazy.
Sent to the Mad Angler squad.
What a way to put it.
Well, Amuro did run away with the Gundam.
But she's in the kitchen now.
There's still a sense of safety.
Kai is kind of a nice guy.
The guy on the boat earlier.
This is basically a hostage situation.
Kai is becoming like a double spy.
Only Gundam is available, so no choice.
Hey... nobody on this ship is at fault, right?
What's that? A beam comes out too?
This on debut day is brutal.
Seriously painful... what is this, too painful.
I kinda don't care about Jaburo.
This isn't the time for that.
It's trouble if there's a spy.
Because he says stuff like that...
What they're doing is super scary though.
You don't want to go there.
He's super used to being punched.
Are you saying my response was bad?
Orders changing the next day is crazy.
Ya, yabai yabai yabai yabai yabai yabai yabai.
Thought I was watching "The Transporter" just now.
What they're doing is brutal, but cute.
I don't know what face to make watching this anymore.
Burning bright red with the color of blood.
Seriously, those nail-like claws are scary.
Come to the field! To the field!
If I could treat it like a kids' action show...
And just watch it like that...
But somehow, it won't let me do that.
It really won't let me do that.
I'll pause and go to the bathroom...
You know, I thought about a lot of things.
There's one thing I absolutely think I should do.
I thought I should write here that I'm talking about Gundam.
I was thinking in the bathroom, "I definitely need this."
From what Subaru sees, without exception...
I don't know if he volunteered or what...
Leaving Bright alone in that situation...
They don't *need* to be there anymore.
That one time they stopped somewhere.
Or the way to return to normal.
I felt like, "You're doing this on purpose."
You can tell just by watching.
Katz, Letz, and Kikka wanting to stay together...
Normally you should absolutely stop them.
But there's that feeling of... "Even if they're here..."
"It's better to let them come with us?"
It feels like a super dangerous shared destiny.
This phrasing is a bit much, but...
But Miharu herself is a very kind girl.
Looking at their attitude, you can tell they're resolved.
But before you know it, they die so abruptly.
And they die abruptly, and then...
Enemies keep coming one after another.
It's bad, like there's no time to mourn.
"Can't be helped! Can't be helped! Next!"
Everyone has too much of their own.
"Then who is the bad guy in this anime?"
"Who is evil and what was the correct choice?"
There's seriously not much of that.
You don't even know why they're fighting.
Like, isn't the feeling of "getting dragged into it" extreme?
Like, the enemy is attacking and we don't want to die...
And "I want to protect where I am now so I have to fight."
There's so much suffering with no right answer.
When they happened to eat together...
Ramba Ral-san and his crew were nice people.
"I have to do my best for my subordinates," like that.
The point where Ramba Ral-san made Subaru go...
Well, as a result, for the subordinates...
It might benefit the subordinates, but...
Like, "Wow, what a sense of values."
Inside the insane ethics of war...
Well, I can imagine it, but...
I was pretty surprised by that, normally.
Well, he's normally a good person.
There was a scene of them just eating normally.
And even with orders from above...
Amuro would run away from home.
Well, but Amuro has resolved himself now.
This is a totally separate point, but...
I want to get hyped, but...
I get that kind of feeling.
No, seriously, when he said "I'll take it"...
It was funny but a little sad.
I don't really want him to grow.
I don't want him to grow too much.
I want them to say that and let Amuro go home.
Start saying random stuff so they judge...
"This guy should go back to his parents' house once."
Not having a home to return to is true.
Normally, she's not the type to be a spy.
If they met normally, they wouldn't be enemies.
They hit it off pretty well.
They would have just dated in a park.
Mysteriously, because a war is happening...
Becoming a double spy and out of guilt...
It was tough. Kai crying... normally.
Don't screw with me! Like that.
And the higher-ups are eating sandwiches!
And saying "We'll experiment in actual combat!"
"No, well, it can't be helped, right?"
"There's no time, we just have to do it," if they say that...
You guys go to the field!
Subaru is becoming a White Base Monster Parent.
Subaru is a White Base Monster Parent, so.
"You're producing great results, so it's fine."
Got marked by Erwin and couldn't run away.
And Amuro burying it in the desert...
Maybe that was the correct choice.
Knowing we can't talk it out...
Even when the Gundam came out...
I couldn't really go "Yay!" at the end.
If there was a hero like that...
"I want to be a loser" means...
Saying "I want to be a loser"...
Less damaging to my mental state.
In a situation where we don't know the meaning...
I was watching while thinking about that.
You guys are looking at it like *that*.
When a girl says "This is how it is"...
You should say "Yeah, yeah, that's right."
Don't you hate not doing that?
Anything else you want me to talk about?
You'd want to go "Wow, do your best! Go!"
Where you want to be like that...
Named characters are dying left and right.
It gave me a really strange feeling.
Katz, Letz, and Kikka driving the car.
I thought that was amazing too.
Katz, Letz, and Kikka were amazing.
Everything up to that point was so intense...
"Yeah, they'd do at least that much."
I was most surprised at myself for thinking that.
"Raised on White Base, they'd do that."
Becoming like that was the most...
Shocking. I was shocked at myself for thinking that.
White Base Kindergarten is crazy, seriously.
A character meaningful in every way.
Why was such a beauty named Matilda there?
Whether she was good or bad...
There are people saved because Matilda was there.
People who ended up in terrible situations.
Was she really there by chance?
Monster Parent, so I won't forgive her.
I'm super White Base Monster Parent right now.
Just one adult entering White Base...
It just looks that way no matter what.
I know this feeling will last forever.
The ending happens and it's over.
Subaru will sleep while thinking "But..." tonight.
Char's activity? Honestly, not the time for that.
Ki- our side got done in!
Char will be revealed next time, probably.
Like, I knew there was a guy named Casval.
I felt that for a second.
But sorry, it's not the time for that.
Well, this will become clear next time too?
"You stand out too much," I thought.
You understand every time he infiltrates.
When she said "I will pilot the Gundam"...
Sayla had ups and downs too.
I like Hamon-san quite a bit.
But she tried to bomb White Base...
No, Hamon-san was a super fine woman.
Character-wise, I might like Hamon the best.
Inheriting that will, she was a cool woman.
Her fighting style was super cool too.
And taking Amuro's back was amazing.
But because of that, Ryu-san died!
Eh? Am I favoring White Base too much?
Because Amuro is on White Base!
With what perspective is everyone watching?
I can only watch from White Base perspective.
Okay, I guess I'll sleep soon.
I want to have a party.
Thank you very much for today too.
That's right, turn White Base into an apartment...
There are good people on the Zeon side too.
Thank you very much for today.
